data.eml:eml: A new cleaner species of Elacatinus (Actinopterygii: Gobiidae) from the Southwestern Atlantic

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sazima, Ivan, Carvalho-Filho, Alfredo, Sazima, Cristina (2008): A new cleaner species of Elacatinus (Actinopterygii: Gobiidae) from the Southwestern Atlantic. Zootaxa 1932: 27-32, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.184869
